00021 /* $Id: debug.c 1463 2012-08-28 19:57:47Z benoitg $ */
00027 #include <stdio.h>
00028 #include <errno.h>
00029 #include <syslog.h>
00030 #include <stdarg.h>
00031 #include <time.h>
00032 #include <unistd.h>
00033 
00034 #include "conf.h"
00035 
00038 void
00039 _debug(char *filename, int line, int level, char *format, ...)
00040 {
00041     char buf[28];
00042     va_list vlist;
00043     s_config *config = config_get_config();
00044     time_t ts;
00045 
00046     time(&ts);
00047 
00048     if (config->debuglevel >= level) {
00049 
00050         if (level <= LOG_WARNING) {
00051             fprintf(stderr, "[%d][%.24s][%u](%s:%d) ", level, ctime_r(&ts, buf), getpid(),
00052                             filename, line);
00053             va_start(vlist, format);
00054             vfprintf(stderr, format, vlist);
00055             va_end(vlist);
00056             fputc('\n', stderr);
00057         } else if (!config->daemon) {
00058             fprintf(stdout, "[%d][%.24s][%u](%s:%d) ", level, ctime_r(&ts, buf), getpid(),
00059                             filename, line);
00060             va_start(vlist, format);
00061             vfprintf(stdout, format, vlist);
00062             va_end(vlist);
00063             fputc('\n', stdout);
00064             fflush(stdout);
00065         }
00066 
00067         if (config->log_syslog) {
00068             openlog("wifidog", LOG_PID, config->syslog_facility);
00069             va_start(vlist, format);
00070             vsyslog(level, format, vlist);
00071             va_end(vlist);
00072             closelog();
00073         }
00074     }
00075 }
